case.name: John Holland Pty Ltd ACN 004 282 268 v Construction, Forestry, Mining and Energy Union [2009] FCA 324 (25 March 2009)

citances.sentence: Yet further it was submitted that his Honour should have referred to an interlocutory judgment delivered by him on 25 March 2009, John Holland Pty Ltd ACN 004 282 268 v Construction, Forestry, Mining and Energy Union [2009] FCA 324 at [17] in which, so it was said, "being in possession of vastly more material than the officials ever had but including Appendix 1 to the Expansion Agreement) that there was an arguable case supporting the appellant unions' construction of the agreement".
